issue.title: [C++][Python] Add promotion and casting to between ternary kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15446](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15446). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Compare operators such as <,<=,> and >= do promotion of decimal types to allow for comparisons., for example between the float 1.0 and the integer 1. Similar promotion is needed for between.
